query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases) as total_purchases,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns) as total_campaigns,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns WHERE slug != 'futebol-fraterno') as campaigns_sem_demo;
